sentences.sentence: That is the first principle of social entrepreneurship collaboratory of the SE lab.
sentences.translation: 这是 SE 实验室社会企业家精神合作的第一原则。

sentences.sentence: Because without curiosity we will lose the spirit of innovation and entrepreneurship.
sentences.translation: 因为若是没有好奇心，我们就会失去创新和创业精神。

sentences.sentence: The Small Business & Entrepreneurship Council advocacy group said in a statement, "Small businesses and internet entrepreneurs are not well served at all by this decision."
sentences.translation: 小企业和创业委员会宣传小组在一份声明中表示：“小型企业和互联网企业家完全没有得到本次裁定的丝毫考虑。”
